name: willSetLineFragmentRect(_:forGlyphRange:usedRect:baselineOffset:)
desc: Called by the typesetter just prior to storing the actual line fragment rectangle location in the layout manager.
declaration:
func willSetLineFragmentRect(_ lineRect: NSRectPointer, 
               forGlyphRange glyphRange: NSRange, 
                    usedRect: NSRectPointer,
